mapper.select: select projectNo, projectMainImage, projectName , projectCurCost, projectEndDate, projectStartDate, projectStatus from ( select rownum as r_num, a.* from (select * from project where projectStatus!=1 and projectStatus!=4 order by projectNo ) a ) where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}

select projectNo, projectMainImage,projectName,projectCost,projectEndDate, projectStatus from ( select rownum as r_num, p.* from ( select * from project where projectStatus!=1 and projectStatus!=4 order by projectStartDate ) p, category c
where c.categoryNo=1
where c.categoryNo=2
where c.categoryNo=3
where c.categoryNo=4
where c.categoryNo=5
where c.categoryNo=6
where c.categoryNo=7
where c.categoryNo=8
where c.categoryNo=9
where c.categoryNo=1
and c.categoryNo=p.categoryNo ) where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from project where categoryNo=#{categoryNo} and projectStatus!=1 and projectStatus!=4
select count(*) cnt from project where categoryNo=#{categoryNo} and subcategoryNo=#{subcategoryNo}

select projectNo, memberNo, projectName, projectCost, to_char(projectStartDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') projectStartDate, to_char(projectEndDate,'yyyy-MM-dd') projectEndDate, projectFundCnt, projectMainImage,projectStory, projectStep, projectStatus, categoryNo, projectCurCost from ( select rownum as r_num, a.* from (select * from project where memberNo=#{memberNo} order by projectNo ) a ) project where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from project where memberNo=#{memberNo}
select count(*) cnt from projectdonate d, project p where p.projectNo=d.projectNo and d.memberNo=#{memberNo}
